I saw all the episodes from the beginning to the end of the kyoto arc, but 
no more than that.
I was somewhat hoping they'd re-show those episodes, so I could tape the 
ones were Saitou shows his cute butt (*laughs*) for the first time, but they 
stopped and it pissed me off....
I filed in a complaint, too. ^^

By the way, I'm new here to this group. Sorry for dropping in the middle of 
a discussion without a proper introduction.
So I go by the name Miser Bellatrix, but you can call me whatever you want. 
I have yet to look through all the information here, but I'm certainly very 
interested. The Shinsengumi caught my interest when I first fell in love 
with *cough* Saitou, and ever since I've been obsessed.

...So I don't social much, so what?

Hehehe, anyway, I'm lacking in brains, but I do have an artistic talent. So 
I'll probably be sending little gifts for the members of this group once in 
a while. Hopefully that'll make up for probably never being able to help 
with information gathering.

Miser Bellatrix

"Allow me to give you a hand...with your doom."
